name: Inter Astra (Among the Stars)
description:
This game was made in just 20 days for a Game Jam. Join the discord - https://discord.gg/um86kpxpJM

This is a very scuffed version of a larger vision I have for this game. This is just proof of concept. Check below for any bugs.

I will definitely be adding way more and making a more completed and polished game. There will be tons of more content, and potentially Multiplayer.

Thank you so much for playing!

Bugs - Currently, the mission you get from "Astra Two" does not provide a current objective update. The mission still works and all you have to do is go to Astra One to complete the mission, like it says in the mission description.
